title: League Unplayable since new patch
body:
Since the New patch of 5.11 my ping has gone from low (40) to high (72) and now my ping is low (1,500) to high (12,000) this is nor just over 1 or 2 games this is every game (including bot games) since the new patch has been released. i normally don't complain when things like this happen as sometime there are a bit of lag problems when a new patch is released but, this one actually makes the game unplayable i have tried all the lagg issue solutions that you say on the support part of your main website but they don't work.

on a side note: I tested my internet connection while playing a game of league and my net is fine, download and upload speeds are fine ping is fine but it seems that there are some communication issues between you and us as i can see that i am not the only one on here complaining about it. i would really like it fixed before tomorrow but the likelihood of that happening is slim. it kind of pisses me off that my 1 weekend off i get a fortnight and i can't play my favorite game.

thanks to who ever is going through the same problem and i hope you don't get it as bad as i am
{{champion:51}}  we will miss you :'(

replies.body:
RIP Caitlyn.

I presume the page you're talking about is [this one](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq6). Have you done the more basic stuff, such as closing all other programs and making sure no one else is using your internet connection?

Have you also tried uninstalling your firewall/anti-virus? Be sure there's a way to reinstall them afterward, as browsing the net without them is dangerous. This is only to test.
